attributes.action: London households should be offered a chance to buy Olympic tickets
attributes.additional_details:
Every London household should be offered a chance to buy a pair of tickets for the Olympics.  We are paying more council Tax to pay for it.  Our lives and London transport will be disrupted - yet a lot of us could not get tickets.

Corporations are now offering tickets as part of competitions to increase sales - surely Londoners should come before corporations.
